attributes.action: Publish and display at every Covid briefing the number vaccinated daily.
attributes.additional_details: To show transparency and give the people of this country hope that the light is coming.
attributes.background: Vaccine roll out is crucial to the social and economic recovery of the United Kingdom. We should be informed on how many have received the vaccine daily and hold the government to account if these numbers stall.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister has confirmed that from next week the number of daily vaccinations will be announced.
